1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council

City Council meetings are held at City Hall at 1700 1st Street on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month at 6 p.m. unless otherwise indicated. Council agendas are posted on this website and the bulletin boards at City Hall at least 72 hours before meetings, as required by the Texas Open Meetings Act.

Council members are elected at large and serve the entire city, not a geographic precinct, for 4-year terms. The mayor pro tem is appointed annually by fellow Council members. City Council positions are not full-time jobs.

NAME POSITION TERM START TERM END
Jim Sweeney Mayor 2025 2029
Tyler Kubena Position 1 2025 2026
Jared Sessum Position 2 2025 2029
Tom Tollett Position 3 2022 2026
Angela Cervantes Position 4 2025 2029
Buddy Hammann Mayor Pro Tem, Position 5 2018 2026
Summer Sanford Position 6 2025 2029

  1. Mayor Jim Sweeney

    Mayor Jim Sweeney was elected as Mayor in May 2025.

  2. Position 1, Tyler Kubena

    Tyler Kubena was elected for City Council Position 1 in May 2025.

  3. Position 2, Jared Sessum

    Jared Sessum was elected to At-Large Council Position 2 in May 2025.

  4. Position 3, Tom Tollett

    Tom Tollett was elected to At-Large Council Position 3 in May 2022.

  5. Position 4, Angela Cervantes

    Angela Cervantes was elected to At-Large Council Position 4 in May 2025.

  6. Position 5, Mayor Pro Tem, Buddy Hammann

    Buddy Hammann was elected to At-Large Position No. 5 in May 2018.

  7. Position 6, Summer Sanford

    Summer Sanford was elected to Seabrook City Council in May 2025.
